mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jd_order (order_no, user_id, product_count, product_amount_total, order_amount_total, address_id, create_time) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{productCount}, #{productAmount}, #{orderAmountTotal}, #{addressId}, #{createTime})
INSERT INTO jd_order_detail (order_id, product_id, product_name, product_price, quantity, sub_total) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{quantity}, #{subTotal})
mapper.select:
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_no, o.user_id, o.status, o.product_count, o.product_amount_total, o.order_amount_total, a.address_id, a.realname, o.create_time FROM jd_order o LEFT JOIN jd_address a ON a.address_id = o.address_id WHERE status != '5'
AND o.status = #{status}

SELECT o.id, o.order_id, o.product_id, o.product_name, o.product_price, p.product_image, o.quantity, o.sub_total, o.remark FROM jd_order_detail o LEFT JOIN jd_product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE jd_order SET status = '5' WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
